meanings: with a flutter[flap, wave], fluttering, flapping, waving
a flag flaps in the wind
a long skirt flapping about the feet

vlive.korean: [펄럭 펄럭] 튀어나온 모습 한 번만 더 보여주시면 안 될까요? [Fluttering] Can you show us how you came out of your photos? 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE TV "FANCY" Comeback Week #1
